Package twcore.core

Class Summary
AdaptiveClassLoader A class loader that loads classes from directories and/or zip-format file such as JAR file.
BotAction The main bot utility class, your bot's best and easiest method of performing actions in the arena, getting information on players, scheduling tasks to be performed, and much more.
BotQueue Separate thread that holds a queue of bots to be spawned, spawns them when ready, and maintains a reference to every spawned bot.
BotSettings Reads, stores, and allows access to the settings in a bot's configuration file.
CoreData Reference object for all important data shared between bots.
EventRequester Used to request which events will be sent to a bot.
HubBot Bot designed to spawn other bots (both manually and automatically from autoload.cfg).
OperatorList Stores the access list as read from the server-based files moderate.txt, smod.txt, and sysop.txt, and the bot core config files owner.cfg, outsider.cfg, and highmod.cfg.
Session  
Start Loads the TWCore setup file and instantiates HubBot with appropriate login and server information.
SubspaceBot Basic abstract class that all Subspace bot classes must extend.
